scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.ios:Pod:Reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:clean: npm run node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev-release: npm run ios:clean && npm run setDevelopment  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:staging-release: npm run ios:clean && npm run setStaging  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "staging"
scripts.ios:prod-release: npm run ios:clean && npm run ios:bundle:assets && npm run setProduction  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "production"
scripts.android:clean: npm run node:clean && cd android && ./gradlew clean
scripts.android:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android:remove:assets: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.android:DD-apk: npm run setDevelopment &&  npm run android:clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.android:DR-apk: npm run setDevelopment &&  npm run android:clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.android:SD-apk: npm run setStaging &&  npm run android:clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.android:SR-apk: npm run setStaging &&  npm run android:clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.android:PD-apk: npm run setProduction &&  npm run android:clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.android:PR-apk: npm run setProduction &&  npm run android:clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.android:PR-Bundle: npm run setProduction &&  npm run clean && npm run android:bundle:assets && npm run android:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.android:dev-apk: npm run android:DD-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.android:dev:release-apk: npm run android:DR-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.android:staging-apk: npm run android:SD-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.android:staging:release-apk: npm run android:SR-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.android:prod-apk: npm run android:PD-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.android:prod:release-apk: npm run android:PR-apk && npm run open-apk
scripts.android:bundle: npm run android:PR-Bundle && npm run open-bundle
